text.section: Except as otherwise provided in this subtitle, the contents of a case record maintained under § 3-601 of this subtitle may not be disclosed.

Except for a disclosure under subsection (b)(5) or (6) of this section, an inmate's case record may be disclosed only if the managing official of the correctional facility:
approves the disclosure; and
is satisfied that:
each applicable condition set forth in subsection (b) of this section has been met;
the record will be used solely for the legitimate purposes of the person or governmental unit that receives it and not for any improper or unauthorized purpose; and
the record will not be further disseminated to a person or governmental unit not authorized to receive it.
The Commissioner shall adopt regulations in accordance with this section to establish procedures that govern the disclosure of an inmate's case record.
